_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Forms, feelings, perceptions, choices, a: There is no form at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.
There’s no feeling at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.
There’s no perception at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.
There’s no choices at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.
There’s no consciousness at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.
